mapper.insert: insert into users(userId, userPw, userName, userNick, userPhone1, userPhone2, userEmail1, userEmail2, addrZipNum, addrBasic, addrDetail, regDate) values(#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userNick}, #{userPhone1}, replace(#{userPhone2}, '-', ''), #{userEmail1}, #{userEmail2}, #{addrZipNum}, #{addrBasic}, #{addrDetail}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from users where userId = #{userId} and userPw = #{userPw}
